CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 14, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "The Gang's All Here! The sweltering summer heat has chased kids of all ages to the modern counterpart of the 'ol' swimmin' hole,' in this case, the swimming pool.  This is a typical scene at any pool in Pittsburgh and vicinity.  Looks inviting, doesn't it? - Courier Photo by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Children splashing in swimming pool, including two girls wearing dark suits on left, with "no diving" inscribed on pavement in foreground, possibly at Ammon Recreation Center
